 2016-08272016-09-23,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectCertificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-116 - Imperial Oil Resources Ventures Limited
PrecisOrder approving the issuance of AMENDING ORDER AO-001-GC-116 to vary the date on the Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-116 from December 31, 2015 to December 31, 2022 for the Imperial Oil Resources Ventures Limited Mackenzie Valley Pipeline Section 52 Pipeline and related Facilities.
AttachmentsAttachment
